# reading data
```{r}
library(readr)
library(ggplot2)
library(viridis)
myweight <- read_csv("myweight.csv", col_types = cols(Date = col_datetime(format = "%Y-%m-%d"), 
    ExerciseTimeLevel = col_factor(levels = c("250", 
        "500", "750", "1000"))))
```

# ploting 
```{r}
ggplot(myweight, aes(Date, Weight)) + geom_point(aes(color=Calories, size=ExerciseTime)) + geom_smooth(method='loess', span=0.2) + scale_color_viridis('Weekly Calories', option='plasma') + scale_size(name='Weekly ExerciseTime(mins)') + theme(legend.position = c(0.85, 0.7), legend.background = element_rect(fill=alpha('grey', 0))) + ylab('Weight(kg)') + labs(title='BodyMass') + scale_y_continuous(breaks=seq(round(min(myweight$Weight), 0), round(max(myweight$Weight), 0) + 1, 1)) + scale_x_datetime(date_breaks = 'month')
```
